Title: Pianist
Description: ['When a famous pianist is badly injured, his hopes for the future are shattered. To aid his recovery, Yuna, a lovely android with a heart of gold, will do anything to help... ']
Related: ['Adaptation: Mikakunin de Shinkoukei', 'Side story: Mikakunin de Shinkoukei: Mite. Are ga Watashitachi no Tomatteiru Ryokan yo.']
